title: Kennedy adds two OB-GYNs to vaccine advisory panel amid review of shots for pregnant women
description: ACIP is reviewing the shots recommended for pregnant women as RFK Jr. upends federal vaccine policy.
content: ACIP is reviewing the shots recommended for pregnant women as RFK Jr. upends federal vaccine policy.
